characterCards.name: HERALD
characterCards.effect: Choose an island and calculate the majority as if Mother Nature had finished her move there. In this turn Mother Nature will move as usual and on the Island where her movement ends, the majority will normally be calculated.

characterCards.name: KNIGHT
characterCards.effect: This turn, you have 2 additional influence points when calculating influence.

characterCards.name: CENTAUR
characterCards.effect: When counting the influence on an Island (or a group of Islands), the Towers present are not counted.

characterCards.name: FARMER
characterCards.effect: During this turn, you take control of Professors even if you have the same number of Students in your Dining Room as the player currently controlling them.

characterCards.name: FUNGARUS
characterCards.effect: Choose a Student color; this turn, that color provides no influence when calculating influence.

characterCards.name: JESTER
characterCards.effect: You can take up to 3 students from this card and exchange them with as many Students present in your Entrance.

characterCards.name: THIEF
characterCards.effect: Choose a Student color; each player (including you) must return 3 Students of that color present in their Dining Room to the students bag. Whoever has fewer than 3 Students of that color will put back all he has.

characterCards.name: MINESTREL
characterCards.effect: You can exchange up to 2 Students present in your Dining Room and in your Entrance.

characterCards.name: MONK
characterCards.effect: Take 1 Student from the card and place it on an Island of your choice. Then, draw 1 Student from the bag and place it on this card.

characterCards.name: GRANNY_HERBS
characterCards.effect: Place a Prohibition tile on an Island of your choice. The first time Mother Nature finishes her movement there, return the Prohibition tile to the card WITHOUT calculating influence on that Island or placing Towers.

characterCards.name: MAGIC_POSTMAN
characterCards.effect: You can move Mother Nature up to 2 more Islands than indicated on the Assistant card you played.

characterCards.name: SPOILED_PRINCESS
characterCards.effect: Take 1 Student from this card and place it in your Hall. Then draw a new Student from the bag and place it on this card.
